name: Olena P.
text: The volunteers arranged medical supplies for our brigade in just two days. We felt supported every step of the way.

name: Serhii K.
text: I receive regular updates on how my donations are used. Transparency like this keeps me contributing month after month.

name: Nataliia M.
text: My family got warm clothing and heaters before the first snow. The team truly listens to urgent needs.

name: Andrew L.
text: Partnering with the foundation made it easy for our company to fundraise and deliver generators to front-line units.

name: Tetiana R.
text: Evacuation transport was organized overnight when we had to leave our town. We are safe thanks to your help.

name: Dmytro B.
text: Every fundraiser has a clear goal and timeline. I trust that my contribution closes a real gap for defenders.

name: Iryna H.
text: Counseling support for my children was arranged quickly and free of charge. It made a huge difference for us.

name: Oleh V.
text: Volunteers shared photos after delivering drones we purchased together. Seeing the impact motivates the whole community.

name: Yuliia S.
text: We got laptops for online schooling while displaced. The attention to details proves how much the team cares.
